column4: i'm having problems with my display resolution when i try to start the live cd of ubuntu
that's interesting; I was having troubles with my normal install, but the live cd worked
i got a package of a few live cd- normal install cds in the mail today and all the normal install ones can't find some sort of library, and my screen flickers and pentuples everything
I don't know how to help; I was just commenting. Sorry :(. Eventually I just copied some WORKING settings
